content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":8027,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/23c51667-8b3d-4357-a331-4d8e3d2e9b5a/mobility.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/23c51667-8b3d-4357-a331-4d8e3d2e9b5a/mobility.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"mobility.PNG\",\"name\":\"mobility.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"23c51667-8b3d-4357-a331-4d8e3d2e9b5a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":354,\"height\":84},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Internal Mobility (IM) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is a program within the Talent Mobility Department facilitating and helping employees with moving to open positions across EPAM outside of home country or within. With Internal Mobility program being the initial step in the relocation process, designated Internal Mobility Coordinators assist employees and their Resource Managers with position search, interviews, offers, and much more. Once the position in new location is confirmed, the Talent Mobility team and Relocation Specialists provide EPAMers with relocation support and assist with physically moving to their new location abroad. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":361572,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9c1389c2-e319-4bb5-949f-5049cb54da06/mobility2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9c1389c2-e319-4bb5-949f-5049cb54da06/mobility2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"mobility2.PNG\",\"name\":\"mobility2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9c1389c2-e319-4bb5-949f-5049cb54da06\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":886,\"height\":309},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5425,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b00844a9-ba45-487e-a7e3-7f856502d8cd/opportunities.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b00844a9-ba45-487e-a7e3-7f856502d8cd/opportunities.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"opportunities.PNG\",\"name\":\"opportunities.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b00844a9-ba45-487e-a7e3-7f856502d8cd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":312,\"height\":88},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OPPORTUNITIES\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Â i\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"s an internal job search portal where EPAMers can find new positions within the company. It allows employees to find positions best aligned to their skills and interests and apply for them. A personalized list of positions, suggested by an AI model, helps to find a perfect job faster.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":18555,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eaae54cb-42cd-44ee-ad9f-589e11b03207/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eaae54cb-42cd-44ee-ad9f-589e11b03207/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"eaae54cb-42cd-44ee-ad9f-589e11b03207\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":548,\"height\":419},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With the Opportunities tool, you can \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SEARCH\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for new opportunities within EPAM, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"APPLY\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for the new roles directly, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ENJOY\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" working with a new team!\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
